DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether oglemilast is safe and effective in the treatment of allergen-induced asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Oglemilast for the Treatment of Asthma
DOC.criteria: Mild atopic asthma Hyperreactivity to methacholine Exhibit positive response to standard allergen skin prick test Pulmonary disease other than asthma Asthma exacerbation within 4 weeks History of substance abuse Active cardiac disease
